name: Resident Lover Demo
description:
Attend the prestigious Miranda's All Girls University, hidden away in Romania. Choose to either join the ongoing theatre production lead by the campus diva, the student council spearheaded by a heartless president, or seek the truth about a 'supposed' conspiracy on campus with your roommates. Find love, discover adventure, uncover secrets, and maybe get in over your head by finding more than you bargained for ...

Play through the first five chapters of Cassandra's route in this Demo.

And please tell us what you think! You can find us collectively on twitter and tumblr or individually via the links down below. If you'd like to see more soon, make sure to follow us and check in for updates on new routes.

  • LIs in the full game: Alcina Dimitrescu, Donna Beneviento, Miranda, Bela, Cassandra, and Daniela Dimitrescu, and Angie
  • The map in the journal is still wholly unavailable in the demo
  • Demo length: 10,000 words
  • Available for Windows, Mac, and Linux

(Only Cassandra is available for the demo.)

Arlanorr: Coding
 Dead Finches: Art & Concept
 CinderSpots: Writing

 Vizzi: Promotional Design

Controls:

  • Left Click / Enter - Interact
  • Right Click / ESC - Close menus; Open the Save Screen during dialogue
  • Mouse Wheel / Page Up & Page Down - Scroll back and forth through dialogue you have already played
  • Space - Advance dialogue
  • Ctrl - Skip dialogue
  • Tab - Toggle atomatic dialogue skipping
  • Arrow Keys - Navigate
  • H / Middle Mouse Button - Hide and show UI
  • S - Take a screenshot
  • F - Toggle fullscreen
  • DLT (when hovering over used save slots) - Delete save games
  • V - Toggle assistive voicing for the visually impaired
  • Shift + A - Open accessibility menu
